main.name: Brandon Brown
main.description: I'm passionate about web design, music and gaming. I welcome teamwork and am open to collaborating with other developers on projects. Please feel free to contact me about any project collaborations or job opportunities
main.bio: I am an open-minded and dedicated creative with a passion for building and problem-solving. Growing up, I always enjoyed hands-on challenges, whether it was crafting art projects or assembling furniture. This passion naturally led me to coding during college, where I discovered a new and exciting way to create. After college, I deepened my skills by joining the Pursuit Fellowship program, where I gained invaluable experience collaborating with a diverse and talented team. Together, we tackled complex challenges and built impactful applications, solidifying my love for team-oriented development. Now, as a Software Engineer with 2 years of professional experience, I specialize in creating scalable, user-focused web applications using technologies like React, Next.js, and MongoDB. I’m excited to bring my creativity, problem-solving skills, and dedication to a team where I can continue to grow and contribute to meaningful projects.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to me for any opportunities!

resume.skillmessage: Here are technologies that I know and use to build projects

education.description: Relevant Coursework: JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS/SCSS, React, Redux, PostgreSQL, Test-Driven Development, Deployment, Express.js, Node.js, APIs, Axios, CORS, Git, Trello, Figma, Gemini AI

Relevant Coursework: Computer Fundamentals (CIS 101), Information Process I (CIS 151), Information Process II (CIS 251), Programming Internet Environment I (CIS 375), Computer Organization (CIS 315),  Algorithms and Programming (CIS 190)

work.title: Help Desk Analyst I
work.description: Delivered technical support for over 50+ desktops, laptops, printers, and mobile devices, ensuring minimal downtime for users. Diagnosed and resolved complex technical issues related to hardware, software, network systems, and implemented permanent solutions. Conduct regular audits of the client’s digital technology devices and equipment to ensure they are up to date and functioning properly. Re-imaged an average of 20 devices per week, improving system performance and user experience. Managed inventory for all on-site equipment and performed basic maintenance tasks, such as replacing printer ink and light bulbs, ensuring operational readiness.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Lead the integration of a new font interface into the marketplace application. Modernized outdated codebases, reducing application errors and improving system performance. Designed APIs and integrated third-party services, improving application scalability and expanding functionality for key stakeholders. Built and optimized high-performing software solutions, reducing application load times by 40% and enhancing overall user satisfaction. Tested methodology with writing and execution of test plans, debugging and testing scripts and tools. Collaborated with cross-functional teams of developers, engineering managers, and designers to develop scalable software solutions that increased client satisfaction by 20%.

work.title: Visual Merchandiser
work.description: Recommend, selected, and helped locate or obtain merchandise based on customer needs and desires. Provided exceptional customer service, assisting 30+ customers daily and resolving inquiries to maximize satisfaction. Streamlined fitting room operations and assisted in cash and credit transactions, ensuring smooth daily operations. Trained more than 10+ newly hired associates. Set up displays of merchandise on walls, collets, or tables to attract customers and promote sales.

projects.title: Tinni
projects.category: A website to seamlessly craft and save an itinerary

projects.title: AI Resume Generator
